title: ManArrow
author: ManArrow
content: Let's talk live market upcoming analysis here. I have posted a thread couple of days ago and that was just locked by now. I don't know why, however I'm start again and post your analysis and thoughts too here. Here is the first one. BAKE Bake I'm buying here. I tried to post this image as a image so many times but comes as just a link. anyone please let me know how to post a image as a image without appearing the link. Thank you https://i.imgur.com/oGHCJ4P.png

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: ManArrow on July 11, 2022, 11:29:06 AMBAKE Bake I'm buying here. You mean like opening a long position?Quote from: ManArrow on July 11, 2022, 11:29:06 AMI tried to post this image as a image so many times but comes as just a link. anyone please let me know how to post a image as a image without appearing the link. Thank you There are limitations for a newbie rank. You need to at least rank up to Jr Member to be able to post images, or you could just buy a copper member rank

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Quote from: ManArrow on July 11, 2022, 11:29:06 AMI have posted a thread couple of days ago and that was just locked by now. I don't know why, however I'm start again and post your analysis and thoughts too here. Because your thread seems to look like a pump and dump discussion and I'm afraid this might be locked too.You should read the forum guidelines, this shouldn't be here, it should in the altcoin section. Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on July 11, 2022, 10:29:58 PMQuote from: ManArrow on July 11, 2022, 11:29:06 AMBAKE Bake I'm buying here. You mean like opening a long position?Buying when the price is up is quite risky.Let him lose his money alone.

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: ManArrow on July 11, 2022, 11:29:06 AMLet's talk live market upcoming analysis here. I have posted a thread couple of days ago and that was just locked by now. I don't know why, however I'm start again and post your analysis and thoughts too here. Here is the first one. BAKE Bake I'm buying here. I tried to post this image as a image so many times but comes as just a link. anyone please let me know how to post a image as a image without appearing the link. Thank you According to the image I saw, it show that the graph in the chart will dump at 50%, So, instead of buying it now, that is too riskyif you do that, but if you have the coins already better to sell them due to that the price will going to dump at around 50% of the price pumping recently. There are a lot of traders doing this method anyway for several times and I've seen this repeatedly in this field of business industry here in the cryptocurrency.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Quote from: ManArrow on July 11, 2022, 11:41:16 AMBAKE NOW-snip-you can move it to altcoin speculations here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=224.0if you don't move it will be very possible for this thread to also be locked by moderatorsread this topics if don't know how to move thread to right board https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5265053.0

comments.author: lixer
comments.body: Quote from: gunhell16 on July 12, 2022, 04:10:16 AMAccording to the image I saw, it show that the graph in the chart will dump at 50%, So, instead of buying it now, that is too riskyif you do that, but if you have the coins already better to sell them due to that the price will going to dump at around 50% of the price pumping recently. There are a lot of traders doing this method anyway for several times and I've seen this repeatedly in this field of business industry here in the cryptocurrency.Thought the OP is going to talk about crypto talk coin by yobit, lol but 50 percent really? Dang! That's a lot and I think this coin have dumped already? Like any other cryptos due to bear. Can't imagine if what will be its value after it dumps another 50 percent but if the coin has a hidden potential then that's a good discount that we will be getting.If we are doubting, we can also invest with smaller amounts. That shouldn't hurt us in case it fail. It's okay to sell as long as he bought at a cheaper rate. He can still be able to make some profit but if not then I don't think selling now is a good idea. The only thing that he will be getting is a loss if he did that.
